Title: A Priest, a Doctor and a Medium Walk into an Execution Chamber
Plot: The girlfriend of a convicted drug lord is killed on the night of his execution. The drug lord's ghost is seen at the crime scene, and Allison is brought in to investigate.  Also, Allison discovers a dark secret about the mother of a boy that Ariel has a crush on.
